Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.pairId: The id of pair to create vault

params.closeRatio: The ratio at which the position will be closed.
params.vaultId: The identifier of the vault to be liquidated.

returns.tradeResult: TradeResult struct with the result of the liquidation.

params.pairId: The id of pair to reallocate the range.

returns._0: pairId The id of the pair.

setOperator(address).details: Only operator can call this function.

take(bool,address,uint256).details: Only the current locker can call this function

updateAssetRiskParams(uint256,(uint256,i.details: The function can be called by pool owner.

params.pairId: The id of asset to update params.

updateFeeRatio(uint256,uint8).details: The function can be called by pool owner.

params.pairId: The id of pair to update params.

updateIRMParams(uint256,(uint256,uint256.details: The function can be called by pool owner.

params.baseIrmParams: Asset interest-rate parameters for base token.
params.pairId: The id of pair to update params.
params.quoteIrmParams: Asset interest-rate parameters for quote token.

updatePoolOwner(uint256,address).details: The function can be called by pool owner.

params.pairId: The id of pair to update owner.

params.recipient: if recipient is zero address, protocol never transfers margin.

withdrawCreatorRevenue(uint256,bool).details: Only pool owner can call this function.

withdrawProtocolRevenue(uint256,bool).details: Only operator can call this function.

BaseTokenNotSettled().notice: Thrown when a base token is not netted out after a lock

CallerIsNotOperator().notice: Thrown when the caller is not operator

CallerIsNotPoolCreator().notice: Thrown when the caller is not pool creator

InvalidPairId().notice: Thrown when a pair id does not exist

LockedBy(address).notice: Thrown when the caller is not the current locker

QuoteTokenNotSettled().notice: Thrown when a quote token is not netted out after a lock

TraderNotAllowed().notice: Thrown when a trader address is not allowed

VaultIsNotDanger(int256,int256).notice: Thrown when a vault isn't danger

execLiquidationCall(uint256,uint256,byte.notice: Executes a liquidation call to close an unsafe vault.

getSqrtIndexPrice(uint256).notice: Gets the square root of the index price

getSqrtPrice(uint256).notice: Gets the square root of the AMM price

reallocate(uint256,bytes).notice: Reallocates the range of concentrated liquidity provider position

revertVaultStatus(uint256).notice: Gets the status of the vault

supply(uint256,bool,uint256).notice: Supplies liquidity to the lending pool

trade((uint256,uint256,int256,int256,byt.notice: This function allows users to open or close perpetual future positions.

updateRecepient(uint256,address).notice: Updates margin recipient address for position liquidation

withdraw(uint256,bool,uint256).notice: Withdraws liquidity from the lending pool

userdoc.notice: Holds the state for all pairs and vaults
